In fact, while Eric Schmidt had his hand on the helm, values were changed to go where the money was. News of the change overshadowed an otherwise solid financial year for Google. Michael Vick ( quad) said Monday that he is only "75 percent" healthy. Our View: Michael Vick responded to questions about his potential absence against the Packers in the Wild Card round by saying, that'll never happen. He said he felt just "50 percent" this weekend, so it's good to hear that he's progressing quickly. He'll play against Green Bay. January 2, 2011 Michael Vick ( quad)
